item.title: How? do? you? change wat your npcs say
item.dc:creator: @ralazo ralazo
item.description:
@ralazo wrote:

mmmmhhhh
you have added the npc you want that it talk?
ok go to npchandler.java than
search for "moo"than under the last }
add this

} if (npcs[i].npcType == HereTheNPCId) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "YOURE MESSAGE HERE"; }
Compile and run
NOTE*You use this for every npc you want that it talk so just copy it and insert the npc id and the message
good luck
